Interface IAclfBusZeroZFunc

  • All Superinterfaces:

    public interface IAclfBusZeroZFunc
extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject
    A representation of the model object 'IAclf Bus Zero ZFunc'. AclfBus utility function interface
    See Also:
    AclfPackage.getIAclfBusZeroZFunc()

    • Method Detail

      • isConnect2ZeroZBranch

        boolean isConnect2ZeroZBranch()
        Check if the bus connects active branch(es) with small z.

      • findZeroZPathBuses

        java.util.List<BaseAclfBus<?,?>> findZeroZPathBuses()
        Find all connected zero-z buses.
        Set branch.visited to false before calling this method. The branch.visited status will be used to detect zero-z loop. Throw exception if allowZeroZBranchLoop = false and zero-z branch loop found. bus.intFlag is used to track zero Z branch loop. When zero Z branch loop detected, bus.intFlag = 1.

      • hasZbrLoop

        boolean hasZbrLoop()
        Check if the bus has zero-Z branch loop.

      • getNoConnectedZbr

        int getNoConnectedZbr(boolean zbrBusGroup)
        Get number of connected zero-Z branches of the bus or the zbr bus group.
        Parameters:
        zbrBusGroup - If true, get ht connected Zbr of the Zbr bus group
